verbose_text: Both small RNAs and histone H3K4 demethylases were required for reduced insulin signaling to promote fertility of prg-1 / Piwi mutants, implying that an epigenomic silencing process can alleviate the piRNA mediated genome silencing defect of Piwi mutants.
evidence: histone H3K4 demethylases were required for reduced insulin signaling to promote fertility of prg-1
